title: Southern Yemeni separatists accuse Saudi Arabia of air strikes in eastern provinces
summary: Yemen's Southern Transitional Council (STC) separatists on Friday accused Saudi Arabia of carrying out air strikes on their positions in the east of the country, a claim Riyadh has not acknowledged. While vowing they will not be deterred, the STC said it remains open to coordination with the kingdom, underscoring strains within the Saudi-led coalition.
